t_offline_payment_desc: Once transferred, Contact us back with order id that you will get in next step

t_coupon_not_found: This coupon code could not be found
t_coupon_not_yet_started: This promotion code is not yet active

t_link_expires_in_1_hour: This link will expire in 1 hour.

invoice_footer: Thank you for shopping with us
t_go_to_orders_generate_invocies: Please go to orders list to generate invoices for each one

t_remove_from_wishlist_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove selected product from your wishlist?
t_please_select_future_date: Please select a valid date in future
t_review_created_need_review: Your review has been sent. It will be visible shortly
t_confirm_approve_reviews: Are you sure you want to confirm selected reviews

t_email_support_msg_received_details: We have received your message and would like to thank you for writing to us

t_customer_email_order_shipped_details: Your order is on the way to you, thank you for shopping with us
